pdftron.PDF.Annots

Class FileAttachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdftron.PDF.Annot
      • pdftron.PDF.Annots.Markup
        • pdftron.PDF.Annots.FileAttachment

  • public class FileAttachment
extends Markup
    A file attachment annotation (PDF 1.3) contains a reference to a file, which typically shall be embedded in the PDF file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class pdftron.PDF.Annot

    • Field Detail

      • e_Graph

        public static final int e_Graph
        For each FileAttachment annotation, one can specify the icon used to display the annotation by choosing one of the entries the following integer list. e_GraphPushPin - The icon has a graph push pin appearance. e_PaperclipTag - The icon has a paper clip tag appearance. e_Unknow - Undefined.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static FileAttachment create(Doc doc,
                    Rect pos,
                    java.lang.String path,
                    java.lang.String icon_name)
                             throws PDFNetException
        Creates FileAttachment
        Parameters:
        doc - A document to which the annotation is added.
        pos - A rectangle specifying the annotation's bounds, in user space coordinates.
        path - path to the referenced file
        icon_name - the The name of an icon to be used in displaying the annotation, default is PushPin.
        Returns:
        file attachment
        Throws:
        PDFNetException

      • create

        public static FileAttachment create(Doc doc,
                    Rect pos,
                    java.lang.String path)
                             throws PDFNetException
        Creates a file attachment annotation. A file attachment annotation contains a reference to a file, which typically is embedded in the PDF file.
        Parameters:
        doc - A document to which the annotation is added.
        pos - A rectangle specifying the annotation's bounds, specified in user space coordinates.
        path - the path
        Returns:
        A new file attachment annotation.
        Throws:
        PDFNetException
        Note:
        PDF Viewer applications should provide predefined icon appearances for at least the following standard names: Graph PushPin Paperclip Tag. Additional names may be supported as well. Default value: PushPin.

      • export

        public void export(java.lang.String save_as)
            throws PDFNetException
        The function saves the data referenced by this File Attachment to an external file. If the file is embedded, the function saves the embedded file. If the file is not embedded, the function will copy the external file. If the file is not embedded and the external file can't be found, the function returns false.
        Parameters:
        save_as - An optional parameter indicating the filepath and filename where the data should be saved. If this parameter is not specified the function will attempt to save the file using FileSpec.GetFilePath().
        Throws:
        PDFNetException

      • export

        public void export()
            throws PDFNetException
        The function saves the data referenced by this File Attachment to an external file. If the file is embedded, the function saves the embedded file. If the file is not embedded, the function will copy the external file. If the file is not embedded and the external file can't be found, the function returns false.
        Throws:
        PDFNetException

      • getFileSpec

        public FileSpec getFileSpec()
                     throws PDFNetException
        Get the file specification.
        Returns:
        The file associated with this annotation.

      • getIcon

        public int getIcon()
            throws PDFNetException
        Get the icon type as an entry of the enum "Icon".
        Returns:
        The enum "Icon" entry associated with this FileAttachment annotation.
        Throws:
        PDFNetException
        Note:
        The entry specifies the name of an icon that shall be used in displaying the annotation. Conforming readers shall provide predefined icon appearances for at least the following standard names: GraphPushPin PaperclipTag Additional names may be supported as well. Default value: PushPin. The annotation dictionary’s Appearance(AP) entry, if present, shall take precedence over the this entry

      • setIcon

        public void setIcon(int type)
             throws PDFNetException
        Set the icon type using an entry of the enum "Icon". (Optional)
        Parameters:
        type - The enum "Icon" entry associated with this FileAttachment annotation.
        Throws:
        PDFNetException
        Note:
        The entry specifies the name of an icon that shall be used in displaying the annotation. Conforming readers shall provide predefined icon appearances for at least the following standard names: GraphPushPin PaperclipTag Additional names may be supported as well. Default value: PushPin. The annotation dictionary’s Appearance(AP) entry, if present, shall take precedence over the this entry

The annotation dictionary’s Appearance(AP) entry, if present, shall take precedence over the this entry
